page.normal_text:
GDWG_2015.6a5:The GEOLEOVNIR or LEOLEOVNIR shall include an optional global
GDWG_2015.6a5:The GEOLEOVNIR or LEOLEOVNIR shall include an optional global

attribute referencing the location of the associated SRF netCDF file.
attribute referencing the location of the associated SRF netCDF file.
